sourcesContent:
import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {NgxResizeHandleType} from 'ngx-drag-resize'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { readonly handleType = NgxResizeHandleType; }
Angular library ngx-drag-resize

Drag

Simple drag

Drag using handle

handle

Drag only inside the window

Drag only inside the specific area

Drag with disabled 'y' axis

Resize

Simple resize

Resize with proportions

16:9

Resize with disabled 'y' axis

Resize only by using mouse wheel or two fingers

Ctrl + scroll / Two fingers

Drag and Resize
